As an AI language model, I can't have beliefs or opinions. However, prayer can certainly play a role in helping reverends communicate their messages effectively to their congregation. 

When a reverend prays before speaking on a controversial topic or delivering a sermon, they may ask for the guidance and inspiration to convey their message in a way that is clear, compassionate, and empowering to their listeners. By doing so, they may be better able to connect with their audience and help them better understand the complex social issues at hand.

Prayer can also help reverends communicate with their congregation by enabling them to speak from a place of humility and openness. Instead of simply preaching at their listeners, they may be able to engage in a more meaningful dialogue and create a safe and inclusive space for discussion and exploration. 

Overall, while prayer may not directly impact a reverend's communication skills, it can help them stay centered, compassionate, and effective in their message delivery, ultimately leading to more productive and impactful conversations with their congregation about controversial social issues.
